entries.meaning: (of a controversy, question, etc) A person, divinity, or authoritative text which decides.
examples: This written and revealed will of God I said was the Judge and Decider of all Questions.

entries.meaning: (chiefly Britain, Australia, sports) An event or action which decides the outcome of a contested matter.
examples: . . . when the Welshman laid on the 74th-minute decider.

entries.meaning: (computer science) A Turing machine that halts regardless of its input.
